tool_description: Analyzes current land use patterns from survey data, satellite imagery, or field observations to classify actual property usage.

survey_data_source.description: Source of land use data: field_survey, satellite_imagery, assessor_records, aerial_photos

geographic_bounds.description: Bounding box coordinates [min_lat, min_lon, max_lat, max_lon]

classification_system.description: Land use classification standard: anderson, nlcd, local_custom

minimum_parcel_size.description: Minimum parcel size to include in analysis (acres)

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence level for automated classifications (0-1)

error_messages: Invalid geographic bounds: Provide valid coordinates in decimal degrees with min values less than max values.
Unsupported data source: Use one of [field_survey, satellite_imagery, assessor_records, aerial_photos].
Invalid classification system: Use one of [anderson, nlcd, local_custom].
Survey data unavailable: No survey data found for the specified date and geographic area.
Invalid parameters: minimum_parcel_size must be positive, confidence_threshold must be between 0 and 1.
usage: Specify survey_data_source, geographic_bounds, classification_system, and survey_date. Adjust minimum_parcel_size and confidence_threshold to filter results. Set include_vacant_land based on analysis needs.

land_use_categories.description: List of land use categories found in the area

category_percentages.description: Percentage of area for each land use category

total_parcels_analyzed.description: Number of parcels included in the analysis

analysis_confidence.description: Overall confidence score for the analysis (0-1)

dominant_use.description: Most prevalent land use category in the area
